contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Radio station | name = XHNS / XHTLA | image = | city = | area = [[Guerrero]] & [[Oaxaca]], [[Mexico]] | branding = Canal Nueve | slogan = | airdate = | frequency = 96.9 FM | format = Mexican | power = | erp = | class = | callsign_meaning = | former_callsigns = | owner = Corporación Oaxaqueña de Radio y Televisión | webcast = | website = http://www.cortv.com.mx/ | affiliations = }} '''XHNS''' (in Guerrero), and '''XHTLA''' (in Oaxaca) is a [[Mexico|Mexican]] regional news/talk [[radio station]] that serves the states of [[Guerrero]] and [[Oaxaca]]. <br clear=all> {{Guerrero Radio}} {{Oaxaca Radio}} {{Mexico-radio-station-stub}} {{coord missing|Mexico}} [[Category:Regional Mexican radio stations]] [[Category:Spanish-language radio stations]] [[Category:Radio stations in Guerrero]] [[Category:Radio stations in Oaxaca]]
